clone

public java.lang.Object clone()
Method clone returns a clone of the creature.

Overrides:
clone in class com.brackeen.javagamebook.graphics.Sprite
Returns:

getMaxSpeed

public float getMaxSpeed()
Method getMaxSpeed gets the maximum speed of this Creature.

Returns:
Returns a velocity, depending the type of creature

wakeUp

public void wakeUp()
Method wakeUp wakes up the creature when the Creature first appears on screen. Normally, the creature starts moving left.

getState

public int getState()
Method getState gets the state of this Creature. The state is either STATE_NORMAL, STATE_DYING, or STATE_DEAD.

Returns:
Returns the actual state of the creature.

setState

public void setState(int state)
Method setState sets the state of this Creature to STATE_NORMAL,STATE_DYING, or STATE_DEAD.

Parameters:
state - is an integer that modifies the actual state of the creature

isAlive

public boolean isAlive()
Method isAlive checks if this creature is alive.

Returns:
returns a boolean that checks if he creature is alive

isFlying

public boolean isFlying()
Method isFlying Checks if this creature is flying.

Returns:
returns a boolean that checks if the creature is flying.

collideHorizontal

public void collideHorizontal()
Method collideHorizontal is called before update() if the creature collided with a tile horizontally.

collideVertical

public void collideVertical()
Method collideVertical is called before update() if the creature collided with a tile vertically

update

public void update(long elapsedTime)
Method update updates the animaton for this creature.

Overrides:
update in class com.brackeen.javagamebook.graphics.Sprite
Parameters:
elapsedTime - is the time that has passed in the game.
